Address.value: 2 CIRCLE STAR WAY, SAN CARLOS, California, 94070, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Oportun Financial Corp is engaged in providing financial services to people who either do not have a credit score or who may have a limited credit history. The company offers Personal Loans and Auto Loans to its customers. Its product offerings include small-dollar, unsecured installment loans and other products and services.
